t: So many people mention dented cans. Are the Campbell's ...
s: Ancient question but this is still happening in 2023. Pulled out eight cans in my twelve pack yesterday before I got one that wasn't dented. I believe this is happening at the factory because some of the interior cans in the case were dented the worst. What the hell, Campbell's?

Yes, I think every can (or perhaps 10 of the 12?) were BADLY crushed- not just dented. I was not sure if they possibly had botulism, since how can almost every can be affected during shipping? I learned as a registered dietician that a dented can should always be a red flag for possible botulism ...

t: Q: Ok. so how many people received severely dented cans ...
s: Del Monte and Dole have been selling non gmo canned vegetables and fruit, so I will stick with those brands and will avoid Green Giant until they clean up their act. ... No problem with my shipment and I also live close to NYC. Dents don’t hurt the corn inside unless it has broken the vacuum seal.

I ordered 2 cases of the food, 1 case is great the other the cans are very dented, I am not a lover of dented cans I was always told not to use them, I do plan on ordering more but am a little shy about doing it if the cans come dented....

t: Are damaged cans from the grocery store safe to buy now? I see several small markets thriving on sales of these as their main items now. - Quora
s: Answer: Credentials, I used to work for one of the major can making companies. There are 2 basic types of construction, 2 piece and 3 piece, a 2 piece has the body and one end stamped out of a sheet of metal, with a lid seams onto it; the other is a welded tube of metal with the base and lid sea...

t: Good product, had some dented cans
s: The product in the can is as advertised. However about every third can had a small dent.

t: Why do grocery delivery shoppers always pick the dented cans? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 8): They don’t, the store/managers do. It’s pretty simple really. No customer in store, who sees the merchandise prior to purchase, is going to select the dented cans. However, the store still wants to sell these cans, ideally at full price (even though they aren’t supposed ...
